import React from 'react' import TicketCard from '../components/TicketCard' const Dashboard = () => { const tickets = [ {category: 'Q1 2022', color : 'red', title : 'How to be a millionaire', owner : 'Anirudh Kadian', avatar : 'https://miro.medium.com/max/3150/1*NpJHWyoBEy3OLAXfjQHugQ.jpeg', status : 'done', progress : 40, priority : 5, description : 'Make a video on million dollars', timestamp : '2022=02-05' }, {category: 'Q2 2022', color : 'red', title : 'How to be a billionaire', owner : 'Anirudh', avatar : 'https://miro.medium.com/max/3150/1*NpJHWyoBEy3OLAXfjQHugQ.jpeg', status : 'In Progress', progress : 70, priority : 2, description : 'Make a video on Billion dollars', timestamp : '2022=02-06' }, {category: 'Q1 2022', color : 'blue', title : 'How to be a Trillionaire', owner : 'Addu Kadain ', avatar : 'https://miro.medium.com/max/3150/1*NpJHWyoBEy3OLAXfjQHugQ.jpeg', status : 'yet to start', progress : 30, priority : 3, description : 'Make a video on Trillion dollars', timestamp : '2022=02-07' } ] const uniqueCategories = [ // Set creates a group of unique values ...new Set(tickets?.map(({category})=>category)) ] // console.log(uniqueCategories) return (

My Projects

{tickets && uniqueCategories?.map((uniqueCategory, categoryIndex)=> (

{uniqueCategory}

{tickets.filter((ticket)=>ticket.category === uniqueCategory)}
))}
) } export default Dashboard
